Words I've learned recently

15 March 2009

I've started to do crossword puzzles in the newspapers, and I've picked up some unusual words. Here is my short list of new words:

  • adit
  • alate
  • aleta
  • amole
  • ani
  • ansa
  • attar
  • ceria
  • dhole
  • elemi
  • etagere
  • fane
  • feria
  • ikebana
  • ilea
  • iter
  • kiri
  • mastic
  • nipa
  • oca
  • okapi
  • olla
  • oolite
  • oriel
  • orrery
  • oser
  • peplum
  • playa
  • sere
  • sial
  • spelt
  • spet
  • tabard
  • thole
  • toponym

Update 2010-04-09
